# Make a Pull Request

Create a pull request for the current branch.

## Format

The PR description must follow this exact structure:

```markdown
### What changed

[1-2 sentence high-level summary of the functional change]

- [Optional bullet points for important details]
- [Keep bullets focused on what matters]

### Why

[Explain the motivation for the change]

### Demo

[Optional - Include if there are UI changes]
[Screenshot, GIF, or video showing the change]

---

*ðŸ¤– Generated by [Claude Code](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code)*
```

## Before creating the PR

1. Ensure all tests pass: `php artisan test`
2. Ensure code is formatted: `task format`
3. Commit all changes with descriptive messages
4. Push the branch to origin

## Instructions

Use `gh pr create` with the properly formatted title and body.
